description: Single pane of glass for most important Cassandra metrics

panels.description: Nodes that are currently running in this time window
panels.title: Nodes Up

panels.description: Nodes that are currently not running in this time window
panels.title: Nodes Down

panels.description: Rate of compactions during this window
panels.title: Compactions / $rate

panels.description: Rate of CQL requests during this window
panels.title: CQL Requests / $rate

panels.description: Rate of Dropped requests during this window
panels.title: Dropped Messages / $rate

panels.description: Number of connected clients during this time window
panels.title: CQL Clients

targets.expr: histogram_quantile($latency, sum(rate(mcac_client_request_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", instance=~"$host"}[$rate])) by (le, request_type, $by))
sum(mcac_table_memtable_off_heap_size{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$host"}) by ($by)
sum(mcac_table_memtable_on_heap_size{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$host"}) by ($by)
sum(idelta(mcac_table_memtable_switch_count_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by)
sum(idelta(mcac_table_pending_flushes_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by)
sum(irate(mcac_table_compaction_bytes_written_total{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by)
sum(irate(mcac_table_pending_compactions{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$host"}[$rate])) by ($by)
histogram_quantile($latency, sum(irate(mcac_table_range_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$host"}[$rate])) by (le, $by))
histogram_quantile($latency, sum(irate(mcac_table_read_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$host"}[$rate])) by (le, $by))
histogram_quantile($latency, sum(irate(mcac_table_write_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$host"}[$rate])) by (le, $by))
histogram_quantile($latency, sum(irate(mcac_table_coordinator_read_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table"}[$rate])) by (le, $by))

histogram_quantile($latency, sum(irate(mcac_table_coordinator_scan_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster", dc=~"$dc", rack=~"$rack", keyspace=~"$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$host"}[$rate])) by (le, $by))

title: Cassandra Cluster Condensed
